actions.save_delete_settings: Use these options by default when deleting

tasks.clean_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to Clean? This will delete database information and generated content for all scenes and galleries that are no longer found in the filesystem.
tasks.dry_mode_selected: Dry Mode selected. No actual deleting will take place, only logging.
tasks.import_warning: Are you sure you want to import? This will delete the database and re-import from your exported metadata.

config.blacklist_desc: Blacklist items are excluded from queries. Note that they are regular expressions and also case-insensitive. Certain characters must be escaped with a backslash: {chars_require_escape}
config.query_mode_auto_desc: Uses metadata if present, or filename
config.query_mode_dir_desc: Only uses parent directory of video file
config.set_cover_desc: Replace the scene cover if one is found.
config.set_tag_desc: Attach tags to scene, either by overwriting or merging with existing tags on scene.
config.show_male_desc: Toggle whether male performers will be available to tag.

results.fp_found: {fpCount, plural, =0 {No new fingerprint matches found} other {# new fingerprint matches found}}

component_tagger.verb_submit_fp: Submit {fpCount, plural, one{# Fingerprint} other{# Fingerprints}}

dlna.default_ip_whitelist_desc: Default IP addresses allow to access DLNA. Use {wildcard} to allow all IP addresses.
dlna.network_interfaces_desc: Interfaces to expose DLNA server on. An empty list results in running on all interfaces. Requires DLNA restart after changing.
dlna.server_display_name_desc: Display name for the DLNA server. Defaults to {server_name} if empty.

auth.api_key_desc: API key for external systems. Only required when username/password is configured. Username must be saved before generating API key.

credentials.description: Credentials to restrict access to stash.
credentials.heading: Credentials

auth.log_file_desc: Path to the file to output logging to. Blank to disable file logging. Requires restart.
auth.log_http_desc: Logs http access to the terminal. Requires restart.
auth.log_to_terminal_desc: Logs to the terminal in addition to a file. Always true if file logging is disabled. Requires restart.
auth.maximum_session_age_desc: Maximum idle time before a login session is expired, in seconds.
auth.password_desc: Password to access Stash. Leave blank to disable user authentication
auth.username_desc: Username to access Stash. Leave blank to disable user authentication

general.calculate_md5_and_ohash_desc: Calculate MD5 checksum in addition to oshash. Enabling will cause initial scans to be slower. File naming hash must be set to oshash to disable MD5 calculation.
general.check_for_insecure_certificates_desc: Some sites use insecure ssl certificates. When unticked the scraper skips the insecure certificates check and allows scraping of those sites. If you get a certificate error when scraping untick this.
general.chrome_cdp_path_desc: File path to the Chrome executable, or a remote address (starting with http:// or https://, for example http://localhost:9222/json/version) to a Chrome instance.
general.create_galleries_from_folders_desc: If true, creates galleries from folders containing images.
general.create_galleries_from_folders_label: Create galleries from folders containing images
general.excluded_image_gallery_patterns_desc: Regexps of image and gallery files/paths to exclude from Scan and add to Clean
general.excluded_video_patterns_desc: Regexps of video files/paths to exclude from Scan and add to Clean
general.gallery_ext_desc: Comma-delimited list of file extensions that will be identified as gallery zip files.
general.generated_file_naming_hash_desc: Use MD5 or oshash for generated file naming. Changing this requires that all scenes have the applicable MD5/oshash value populated. After changing this value, existing generated files will need to be migrated or regenerated. See Tasks page for migration.
general.generated_files_location: Directory location for the generated files (scene markers, scene previews, sprites, etc)
general.image_ext_desc: Comma-delimited list of file extensions that will be identified as images.
general.include_audio_desc: Includes audio stream when generating previews.

metadata_path.description: Directory location used when performing a full export or import
metadata_path.heading: Metadata Path

general.number_of_parallel_task_for_scan_generat: Set to 0 for auto-detection. Warning running more tasks than is required to achieve 100% cpu utilisation will decrease performance and potentially cause other issues.
Number of parallel task for scan/generation

python_path.description: Location of python executable. Used for script scrapers and plugins. If blank, python will be resolved from the environment
python_path.heading: Python Path

general.scraper_user_agent_desc: User-Agent string used during scrape http requests

scrapers_path.description: Directory location of scraper configuration files
scrapers_path.heading: Scrapers Path

general.sqlite_location: File location for the SQLite database (requires restart)
general.video_ext_desc: Comma-delimited list of file extensions that will be identified as videos.

scraping.excluded_tag_patterns_desc: Regexps of tag names to exclude from scraping results

stashbox.description:
Stash-box facilitates automated tagging of scenes and performers based on fingerprints and filenames.
Endpoint and API key can be found on your account page on the stash-box instance. Names are required when more than one instance is added.
stashbox.name: Name
stashbox.title: Stash-box Endpoints

tasks.backup_and_download: Performs a backup of the database and downloads the resulting file.
tasks.backup_database: Performs a backup of the database to the same directory as the database, with the filename format {filename_format}
tasks.cleanup_desc: Check for missing files and remove them from the database. This is a destructive action.
tasks.defaults_set: Defaults have been set and will be used when clicking the {action} button on the Tasks page.
tasks.dont_include_file_extension_as_part_of_t: Don't include file extension as part of the title
tasks.export_to_json: Exports the database content into JSON format in the metadata directory.

generate.generating_from_paths: Generating for scenes from the following paths

tasks.generate_desc: Generate supporting image, sprite, video, vtt and other files.
tasks.generate_previews_during_scan_tooltip: Generate animated WebP previews, only required if Preview Type is set to Animated Image.
tasks.generate_video_previews_during_scan_tool: Generate video previews which play when hovering over a scene

identify.description: Automatically set scene metadata using stash-box and scraper sources.
identify.explicit_set_description: The following options will be used where not overridden in the source-specific options.
identify.heading: Identify
identify.identifying_from_paths: Identifying scenes from the following paths

tasks.import_from_exported_json: Import from exported JSON in the metadata directory. Wipes the existing database.
tasks.incremental_import: Incremental import from a supplied export zip file.
tasks.migrate_hash_files: Used after changing the Generated file naming hash to rename existing generated files to the new hash format.
tasks.only_dry_run: Only perform a dry run. Don't remove anything
tasks.scan_for_content_desc: Scan for new content and add it to the database.
tasks.set_name_date_details_from_metadata_if_p: Set name, date, details from embedded file metadata

scene_filename_parser.title: Scene Filename Parser
scene_filename_parser.whitespace_chars_desc: These characters will be replaced with whitespace in the title

custom_css.description: Page must be reloaded for changes to take effect.
custom_css.heading: Custom CSS

delete_options.description: Default settings when deleting images, galleries, and scenes.
delete_options.heading: Delete Options

options.delete_generated_supporting_files: Delete generated supporting files by default

disable_dropdown_create.description: Remove the ability to create new objects from the dropdown selectors
disable_dropdown_create.heading: Disable dropdown create

funscript_offset.description: Time offset in milliseconds for interactive scripts playback.
funscript_offset.heading: Funscript Offset (ms)

handy_connection_key.description: Handy connection key to use for interactive scenes. Setting this key will allow Stash to share your current scene information with handyfeeling.com
handy_connection_key.heading: Handy Connection Key

write_image_thumbnails.description: Write image thumbnails to disk when generated on-the-fly
write_image_thumbnails.heading: Write image thumbnails

max_loop_duration.description: Maximum scene duration where scene player will loop the video - 0 to disable
max_loop_duration.heading: Maximum loop duration

menu_items.description: Show or hide different types of content on the navigation bar
menu_items.heading: Menu Items

image_location.description: Custom path for default performer images. Leave empty to use in-built defaults
image_location.heading: Custom Performer Image Path

auto_start_video_on_play_selected.description: Auto-start scene videos when playing selected or random from Scenes page
auto_start_video_on_play_selected.heading: Auto-start video when playing selected

continue_playlist_default.description: Play next scene in queue when video finishes
continue_playlist_default.heading: Continue playlist by default

scroll_attempts_before_change.description: Number of times to attempt to scroll before moving to the next/previous item. Only applies for Pan Y scroll mode.
scroll_attempts_before_change.heading: Scroll attempts before transition

slideshow_delay.description: Slideshow is available in galleries when in wall view mode
slideshow_delay.heading: Slideshow Delay (seconds)

dialogs.delete_alert: The following {count, plural, one {{singularEntity}} other {{pluralEntity}}} will be deleted permanently:
dialogs.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {entityName}?
dialogs.delete_entity_desc: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this {singularEntity}? Unless the file is also deleted, this {singularEntity} will be re-added when scan is performed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete these {pluralEntity}? Unless the files are also deleted, these {pluralEntity} will be re-added when scan is performed.}}
dialogs.delete_galleries_extra: …plus any image files not attached to any other gallery.
dialogs.delete_gallery_files: Delete gallery folder/zip file and any images not attached to any other gallery.
dialogs.delete_object_desc: Are you sure you want to delete {count, plural, one {this {singularEntity}} other {these {pluralEntity}}}?

lightbox.reset_zoom_on_nav: Reset zoom level when changing image

scale_up.description: Scale smaller images up to fill screen
scale_up.label: Scale up to fit

scroll_mode.description: Hold shift to temporarily use other mode.
scroll_mode.label: Scroll Mode

dialogs.overwrite_filter_confirm: Are you sure you want to overwrite existing saved query {entityName}?

scene_gen.force_transcodes_tooltip: By default, transcodes are only generated when the video file is not supported in the browser. When enabled, transcodes will be generated even when the video file appears to be supported in the browser.
scene_gen.image_previews_tooltip: Animated WebP previews, only required if Preview Type is set to Animated Image.
scene_gen.interactive_heatmap_speed: Generate heatmaps and speeds for interactive scenes
scene_gen.marker_image_previews_tooltip: Animated marker WebP previews, only required if Preview Type is set to Animated Image.
scene_gen.marker_screenshots_tooltip: Marker static JPG images, only required if Preview Type is set to Static Image.
scene_gen.markers_tooltip: 20 second videos which begin at the given timecode.
scene_gen.override_preview_generation_options_desc: Override Preview Generation Options for this operation. Defaults are set in System -> Preview Generation.
scene_gen.preview_exclude_end_time_desc: Exclude the last x seconds from scene previews. This can be a value in seconds, or a percentage (eg 2%) of the total scene duration.
scene_gen.preview_exclude_start_time_desc: Exclude the first x seconds from scene previews. This can be a value in seconds, or a percentage (eg 2%) of the total scene duration.
scene_gen.preview_preset_desc: The preset regulates size, quality and encoding time of preview generation. Presets beyond “slow” have diminishing returns and are not recommended.
scene_gen.preview_seg_count_desc: Number of segments in preview files.
scene_gen.preview_seg_duration_desc: Duration of each preview segment, in seconds.
scene_gen.transcodes_tooltip: MP4 conversions of unsupported video formats
scene_gen.video_previews_tooltip: Video previews which play when hovering over a scene

dialogs.unsaved_changes: Unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

dupe_check.description: Levels below 'Exact' can take longer to calculate. False positives might also be returned on lower accuracy levels.
dupe_check.found_sets: {setCount, plural, one{# set of duplicates found.} other {# sets of duplicates found.}}
dupe_check.title: Duplicate Scenes

empty_server: Add some scenes to your server to view recommendations on this page.
name: Name

performer_tagger.any_names_entered_will_be_queried: Any names entered will be queried from the remote Stash-Box instance and added if found. Only exact matches will be considered a match.

config.these_fields_will_not_be_changed_when_up: These fields will not be changed when updating performers.

performer_tagger.refreshing_will_update_the_data: Refreshing will update the data of any tagged performers from the stash-box instance.
performer_tagger.to_use_the_performer_tagger: To use the performer tagger a stash-box instance needs to be configured.
performer_tagger.updating_untagged_performers_description: Updating untagged performers will try to match any performers that lack a stashid and update the metadata.

confirm.almost_ready: We're almost ready to complete the configuration. Please confirm the following settings. You can click back to change anything incorrect. If everything looks good, click Confirm to create your system.

creating.ffmpeg_notice: If ffmpeg is not yet in your paths, please be patient while stash downloads it. View the console output to see download progress.

errors.something_went_wrong_description: If this looks like a problem with your inputs, go ahead and click back to fix them up. Otherwise, raise a bug on the {githubLink} or seek help in the {discordLink}.
errors.something_went_wrong_while_setting_up_yo: Something went wrong while setting up your system. Here is the error we received: {error}

migrate.backup_database_path_leave_empty_to_disa: Backup database path (leave empty to disable backup):
migrate.backup_recommended: It is recommended that you backup your existing database before you migrate. We can do this for you, by making a copy of your database to {defaultBackupPath}.
migrate.migration_failed_error: The following error was encountered while migrating the database:
migrate.migration_failed_help: Please make any necessary corrections and try again. Otherwise, raise a bug on the {githubLink} or seek help in the {discordLink}.
migrate.migration_irreversible_warning: The schema migration process is not reversible. Once the migration is performed, your database will be incompatible with previous versions of stash.
migrate.schema_too_old: Your current stash database is schema version {databaseSchema} and needs to be migrated to version {appSchema}. This version of Stash will not function without migrating the database.

paths.description: Next up, we need to determine where to find your porn collection, where to store the stash database and generated files. These settings can be changed later if needed.
paths.path_to_generated_directory_empty_for_de: path to generated directory (empty for default)
paths.stash_alert: No library paths have been selected. No media will be able to be scanned into Stash. Are you sure?
paths.where_can_stash_store_its_database: Where can Stash store its database?
paths.where_can_stash_store_its_database_descr: Stash uses an sqlite database to store your porn metadata. By default, this will be created as stash-go.sqlite in the directory containing your config file. If you want to change this, please enter an absolute or relative (to the current working directory) filename.
paths.where_can_stash_store_its_generated_cont: Where can Stash store its generated content?

In order to provide thumbnails, previews and sprites, Stash generates images and videos. This also includes transcodes for unsupported file formats. By default, Stash will create a generated directory within the directory containing your config file. If you want to change where this generated media will be stored, please enter an absolute or relative (to the current working directory) path. Stash will create this directory if it does not already exist.
paths.where_is_your_porn_located_description: Add directories containing your porn videos and images. Stash will use these directories to find videos and images during scanning.

success.help_links: If you run into issues or have any questions or suggestions, feel free to open an issue in the {githubLink}, or ask the community in the {discordLink}.
success.in_app_manual_explained: You are encouraged to check out the in-app manual which can be accessed from the icon in the top-right corner of the screen that looks like this: {icon}
success.next_config_step_one: You will be taken to the Configuration page next. This page will allow you to customize what files to include and exclude, set a username and password to protect your system, and a whole bunch of other options.
success.next_config_step_two: When you are satisfied with these settings, you can begin scanning your content into Stash by clicking on {localized_task}, then {localized_scan}.
success.open_collective: Check out our {open_collective_link} to see how you can contribute to the continued development of Stash.
success.welcome_contrib: We also welcome contributions in the form of code (bug fixes, improvements and new features), testing, bug reports, improvement and feature requests, and user support. Details can be found in the Contribution section of the in-app manual.
success.your_system_has_been_created: Success! Your system has been created!

welcome.config_path_logic_explained: Stash tries to find its configuration file (config.yml) from the current working directory first, and if it does not find it there, it falls back to $HOME/.stash/config.yml (on Windows, this will be %USERPROFILE%\.stash\config.yml). You can also make Stash read from a specific configuration file by running it with the -c or --config options.
welcome.next_step: With all of that out of the way, if you're ready to proceed with setting up a new system, choose where you'd like to store your configuration file and click Next.
welcome.store_stash_config: Where do you want to store your Stash configuration?
welcome.unable_to_locate_config: If you're reading this, then Stash couldn't find an existing configuration. This wizard will guide you through the process of setting up a new configuration.
welcome.unexpected_explained: If you're getting this screen unexpectedly, please try restarting Stash in the correct working directory or with the -c flag.

welcome_specific_config.config_path: Stash will use the following configuration file path: {path}
welcome_specific_config.next_step: When you're ready to proceed with setting up a new system, click Next.
welcome_specific_config.unable_to_locate_specified_config: If you're reading this, then Stash couldn't find the configuration file specified at the command line or the environment. This wizard will guide you through the process of setting up a new configuration.

title: Title
